name: Admiration's Decent
description:
Live in a 21st Century City with a booming economy, many young minds move to the Big City in hopes to achieve their hopes and dreams. Some are crushed by the weight of the Cities Skyscrapers while others are getting by fine and dandy. 

The city is run by the powerhouses of Neotropolis, the powerhouses being the ones with Notoriety and following as they set trends and ideals for people to follow, Fans use these powerhouses as their sense of direction. In Neotropolis you either go with it, or you get crushed by it, it  being whatever is “cool” at that moment.

Choose how you interact with the charged online enviornment and deal with the admiration and consequences of your fans!
